sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"种，类，类型"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: kind, sort, type, class, classification, category, species, variety
means: kind ： 指性质相同，而且特征很相似，足以归为一类的人或东西。
sort ： 普通用词，文体较kind随便，指对人或对事物进行的大概分类，有时含贬义。
type ： 指客观界限比较清楚，有相同本质特点的同类事物，或指大致相似的同类事物。
class ： 正式用词，指门类、种类或优劣等级；用于指动植物的分类时，表示"纲"。
classification ： 指根据已经确定的类型对某一实物作鉴别和归类。
category ： 书面用词，特指有确切定义的群体。
species ： 书面用词，单复数同形。指生物分类上的种。
variety ： 强调有各自的特点，形式不同，品质不同的种类。

word_mean: 型，类型，式：任何特定疾病、人或物的一般或主要特性
心理状态的类型同一性理论： type-identity theory of psychological states
第一类回火脆性： Ⅰ temper brittleness 又称“不可逆回火脆性”，“低温回火脆性”。钢淬火后在300℃左右回火时所产生的回火脆性。
第二类回火脆性： Ⅱ temper brittleness 又称“可逆回火脆性”，“高温回火脆性”。含有铬、锰、钨、镍等元素的合金钢淬火后，在脆化温度(400～550℃)区回火，或经更高温度回火后缓慢冷却通过脆化温度区所产生的脆性。

sentence.Network_en: Combined with other compounds, they created a massive dynamite-type bomb.
sentence.Network_cn: 将其与其他化合物结合，就制造出杀伤力极强的硝酸甘油炸弹。

sentence.Network_en: This type of surgery could even be used to extract cancerous growths.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种外科手术甚至可以用来切除癌性肿瘤。

sentence.Network_cn: 有些比较优美的字体经过价廉、通用的电脑打印机处理后就面目全非了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense 'symbol, emblem'): from French, or from Latin typus, from Greek tupos 'impression, figure, type', from tuptein 'to strike'. The use in printing dates from the early 18th cent.: the general sense 'category with common characteristics' arose in the mid 19th cent

encyclopedia.content: 类型（type）以及类型系统的起源以及研究与发展是独立于OOP的。早在五十年代的FORTRAN语言编译器实现中，就已经采用类型系统作为类型检查的一种手段。广义的类型一般被定义为一种约束，也就是一种逻辑公式。

entry.def: A type of something is a group of those things that have particular features in common.

example.ex: There are various types of the disease...

entry.def: If you refer to a particular thing or person as a type of something more general, you are considering that thing or person as an example of that more general group.

example.ex: Have you done this type of work before?...
example.tran: 你以前做过这种活儿吗？

example.ex: Rates of interest for this type of borrowing can be high...
example.tran: 这种类型的借款利率可能会很高。

entry.tran: 具有…特点的人；…类型的人
entry.def: If you refer to a person as a particular type, you mean that they have that particular appearance, character, or way of behaving.

example.ex: It's the first time I, a fair-skinned, freckly type, have sailed in the sun without burning...
example.tran: 身为那种皮肤白皙而又长雀斑的人，这是我第一次在阳光下航行而没有被晒伤。

example.ex: I was rather an outdoor type…
example.tran: 我是那种特别喜欢户外运动的人。

entry.tran: …不感兴趣的类型;并非…喜欢的类型
entry.def: If you say that someone is not your type, you mean that they are not the sort of person who you usually find attractive.

example.ex: At first I thought he was rather ordinary looking, a little chubby, not my type...
example.tran: 刚开始我认为他相貌很普通，有点胖乎乎的，并非我喜欢的类型。

example.ex: I'm not his type. I am probably too strong a character.
example.tran: 我不是他喜欢的类型。大概我性格太要强了。

entry.tran: 用打字机(或文字处理器)打(字)
entry.def: If you type something, you use a typewriter or word processor to write it.

example.ex: I can type your essays for you...
example.tran: 我可以帮你把文章打出来。

example.ex: I had never really learnt to type properly...
example.tran: 我从来没真正学会怎样正确打字。

entry.def: Type is printed text as it appears in a book or newspaper, or the small pieces of metal that are used to create this.

example.ex: The correction had already been set in type.
example.tran: 那处修正已经出现在铅字纸上。

means.word_mean: 1. a subdivision of a particular kind of thing;

sentences.sentence: "what type of sculpture do you prefer?"

means.word_mean: 2. a person of a specified kind (usually with many eccentricities);
3. (biology) the taxonomic group whose characteristics are used to define the next higher taxon
5. a small metal block bearing a raised character on one end; produces a printed character when inked and pressed on paper;

sentences.sentence: "he dropped a case of type, so they made him pick them up"

means.word_mean: 6. all of the tokens of the same symbol;

sentences.sentence: "the word `element' contains five different types of character"

means.word_mean: 1. write by means of a keyboard with types;
2. identify as belonging to a certain type;

auth_sentence.content: The second type of bat is a long-eared bat.
auth_sentence.res_content: The second type of bat is a long-eared bat.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The second type of bat is a long-eared bat.

auth_sentence.content: This type affects about one in a million people.
auth_sentence.res_content: This type affects about one in a million people.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This type affects about one in a million people.

auth_sentence.content: They treat the poor as a type of vermin.
auth_sentence.res_content: They treat the poor as a type of vermin.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They treat the poor as a type of vermin.

Sentence.sentence: What it does mean is that the book business will go through a transformation in the next decade or so more profound than any it has seen since Gutenberg introduced printing from moveable type in the 1450s.
Printing with moveable type on paper dramatically reduced the cost of producing a book compared with the old-fashioned ones handwritten on vellum, which comes from sheepskin
After swiping（敲击）into the iPad app (应用软件 ), which you can get for free here, he opens up a few different types of textbooks.

sentences.en: The type of skirt is all the go.

means.word_mean: 典型人物; 典型, 模范, 模样

sentences.en: He is a fine type of the youth.
sentences.cn: 他是青年人的一个典范。

sentences.en: I dislike man of that type.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢那一类型的人。

sentences.en: Wooden types are now used only for posters.
sentences.cn: 木刻活字现仅用于印刷广告。

means.word_mean: 活字的宽度、字体或字号等

sentences.en: The examples in that dictionary are in italic type.
sentences.cn: 那本字典的例句是用斜体字印刷的。

sentences.en: The book is printed in large type.
sentences.cn: 此书是用大号字体印刷的。

sentences.en: I can't type as rapidly as you.
sentences.cn: 我打字打得没你那么快。

sentences.en: Why did you type the letter when I could have done it for you easily by computer?
sentences.cn: 我本可用计算机很方便地为你打这封信, 你何必费心用打字机呢?

sentences.en: Every day he typed what he composed.
sentences.cn: 他每天都用打字机把他创作的作品打下来。

sentences.en: The doctor has typed her blood.

jushi.english: The type in this book is so small that it is difficult to read.
jushi.chinese: 这本书字太小,读起来很费劲。

jushi.english: He is not the type of man to tell a lie.
jushi.chinese: 他不是那种爱撒谎的人。

jushi.english: I dislike man of that type.
jushi.chinese: 我不喜欢那一类型的人。
